item.content:encoded: An amazing round up of goodies. You are a baking star! Hope 2011 holds lots more sweetness for you!

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description: Happy new year, Anita! Such an exquisite roundup! Can't wait to see what is coming next for the entire 2011. Wish you great luck and success :-)
item.content:encoded: Happy new year, Anita! Such an exquisite roundup! Can’t wait to see what is coming next for the entire 2011. Wish you great luck and success ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Wendy @ Obesebaby
item.dc:creator: Wendy @ Obesebaby
item.description: Nice round up for the year! I still haven't had a chance to try the snow egg. hope they still have it this yr!
item.content:encoded: Nice round up for the year! I still haven’t had a chance to try the snow egg. hope they still have it this yr!

item.title: By: Emma @CakeMistress
item.dc:creator: Emma @CakeMistress
item.description: Happy New Year! Truly a great year of baking there. Here's to plenty more sweet treats in 2011.
item.content:encoded: Happy New Year! Truly a great year of baking there. Here’s to plenty more sweet treats in 2011.

item.title: By: Suz
item.dc:creator: Suz
item.description: What a year of food! I'm in awe! I hope you have a wonderful (and delicious food-filled) 2011. :)
item.content:encoded: What a year of food! I’m in awe! I hope you have a wonderful (and delicious food-filled) 2011. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: My goodness what a beautiful round up of photos. Your year has truely been successful! Congratulations! The V8 cake is brilliant! Thank you for your concern. We are very much North of the floods though we did have a cyclone and major flooding on Christmas Day. However the water went down very quickly and our home is not affected by floods. Supermarket supplies are getting very low here though due to transport not getting through. Better than being in the midst of it, though!
item.content:encoded: My goodness what a beautiful round up of photos. Your year has truely been successful! Congratulations! The V8 cake is brilliant! Thank you for your concern. We are very much North of the floods though we did have a cyclone and major flooding on Christmas Day. However the water went down very quickly and our home is not affected by floods. Supermarket supplies are getting very low here though due to transport not getting through. Better than being in the midst of it, though!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Happy New Year, Anita! Your desserts are so artistic. I am drooling over that ciabatta bread with the perfect crumb. :)
item.content:encoded: Happy New Year, Anita! Your desserts are so artistic. I am drooling over that ciabatta bread with the perfect crumb. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jimena
item.dc:creator: Jimena
item.description: Thanks for commenting on my 2nd doughnut attempt. I'm with your sister on making custard filled doughnuts! YUM =) I loved your year-end roundup...each picture was absolutely gorgeous!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for commenting on my 2nd doughnut attempt. I’m with your sister on making custard filled doughnuts! YUM =) I loved your year-end roundup…each picture was absolutely gorgeous!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Lovely year-end roundup, Anita! Happy New Year to you and I'm looking forward to sharing another year of recipes!
item.content:encoded:
Lovely year-end roundup, Anita!
Happy New Year to you and I’m looking forward to sharing another year of recipes!

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Happy New Year Anita! And what a delicious wrap up. I hope 2011 holds more delicious goodies for you :)
